src:
FOTO UBOD: Zvezda, LE!
Liga Evrope?

06 Nov 2019

Apelovalo je tvrdokorno jezgro navijača da se ne dozvoli bruka na stadionu “Rajko Mitić“, molilo one koji nisu redovni na “Marakani“ da ne beže od kiše i – upalilo je! Nemamo još precizan podatak o broju navijača, teško da je baš dupke pun stadion, ali jeste fudbalere Totenhema sačekalo dobrano popunjena “Marakana“. I pored već čuvena koreografija “delija“. Ovog puta prosta, razumljiva.“ZVEZDA, LE!“, stihovi su koji često odzvanjaju “Rajkom“, mada bi ovog puta mogli da ih shvatimo i dvosmisleno.
Jer Crvena zvezda u ova tri kola juri – Ligu Evrope. Videćemo da li će se navijački san ispuniti. Nokaut faza Lige šampiona ipak je još predaleko od srpskih predstavnika u Evropi.
(FOTO: mozzartsport.com)
text:
PHOTO INJECTION: Star, LE!
Europa League?

06 Nov 2019

The hard-core fans were urged not to allow the noise at Rajko Mitic Stadium, begging those who are not regular at Marakana not to run out of rain and - it worked! We do not yet have precise figures on the number of fans, hardly a full stadium, but the Tottenham footballers were waiting for the well-filled Marakana. Despite the already famous choreography of "delia". This time it's simple, understandable. "STAR, LE!" Are verses that often echo "Rajko", though this time we might even understand them ambiguously.
Because the Red Star is racing in these three rounds - the Europa League. We'll see if the fan dream comes true. The knockout phase of the Champions League, however, is still too far from Serbian representatives in Europe.
(PHOTO: mozzartsport.com)
